results.title: Jeremy Renner Was Run Over by 7-Ton Snow Plow, Authorities Say
results.abstract: The 51-year-old Marvel actor, who remained in a critical but stable condition on Tuesday, said in an Instagram post that he was “too messed up now to type,” but sent his love.

media.caption: Jeremy Renner at the premiere of the Marvel mini-series “Hawkeye” in Los Angeles in 2021.

results.title: How Will the Suspended Bills-Bengals Game Be Resolved?
results.abstract: The N.F.L. has a number of options, none of them perfect, for how to handle competition for the last week of the regular season and the playoffs.

media.caption: Paycor Stadium in Cincinnati was the site of the suspended Bills-Bengals game.

results.adx_keywords: Traffic Accidents and Safety;Deaths (Fatalities);Automobiles
results.byline: By Jenny Gross and McKenna Oxenden
results.title: Father Deliberately Drove Car Off Cliff, Authorities Say After Dramatic Rescue
results.abstract: Dharmesh A. Patel was arrested on suspicion of attempted murder and child abuse after his Tesla careened off a treacherous cliff in Northern California with him, his wife and two children inside, the authorities said.

media.caption: At the scene of the crash, off Highway 1 in Northern California on Monday.

results.title: What to Know About Damar Hamlin’s Injury
results.abstract: Hamlin, a Buffalo Bills safety, was in critical condition at a hospital after going into cardiac arrest following a routine tackle.

results.title: Jeremy Renner Is in Critical Condition After Snow Plowing Accident
results.abstract: The actor, known for his role as Hawkeye in Marvel’s Avengers movies, had surgery, his representative said.

media.caption: Jeremy Renner plays the superhero Hawkeye in Marvel movies and a television series.

results.byline: By Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs and Mike Baker
results.title: Idaho Killings Suspect Got New License Plate Days After Murders
results.abstract: Records show the suspect’s Hyundai Elantra got a new registration in Washington State shortly after four students at the University of Idaho were murdered.

media.caption: Dashboard camera footage released by the Indiana State Police showed a trooper stopping Bryan Kohberger and his father on Dec. 15 for following a vehicle too closely.

results.byline: By Shawn Hubler, Soumya Karlamangla, Jacey Fortin and Jill Cowan
results.title: Powerful Storm Hits California, as Residents Brace for More Flooding
results.abstract: After several damaging storms swept through California in recent weeks, Gov. Gavin Newsom has declared a state of emergency amid another deluge.

media.caption: Highway traffic outside Santa Rosa, Calif., on Wednesday night.

results.adx_keywords: Layoffs and Job Reductions;Computers and the Internet;Labor and Jobs;Company Reports;Cloud Computing;Enterprise Computing;Benioff, Marc;Salesforce.com Inc
results.byline: By Isabella Simonetti and Kalley Huang
results.title: Salesforce to Lay Off 10% of Staff and Cut Office Space
results.abstract: The software company plans to cut around 8,000 jobs as business slows for tech companies. “We hired too many people leading into this economic downturn,” Salesforce’s chief executive said.

media.caption: Salesforce is laying off about 8,000 employees and cutting back on office space.

results.title: Suspect in College Student Killings Is Being Taken to Idaho
results.abstract: The 28-year-old Ph.D. student accused in the killings of four University of Idaho students will face four counts of murder.

results.byline: By Annie Karni and Michael Gold
results.title: George Santos Came to Washington. It Was Awkward.
results.abstract: On the first day of the 118th Congress, the representative-elect, a Republican who has made false claims about his background, education and finances, brought his saga to Capitol Hill.

media.caption: George Santos is under the shadow of active investigations by federal and local prosecutors into potential criminal activity during his two congressional campaigns.

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;McCarthy, Kevin (1965- );Jordan, Jim (1964- );Jeffries, Hakeem;House of Representatives;Republican Party
results.title: McCarthy Flounders as G.O.P. Rebellion Paralyzes the House for a Second Day
results.abstract: The House continued a historic floor showdown — the first in a century — prompted by the Republican leader’s failure to secure a majority to become speaker.

media.caption: Representative Kevin McCarthy, Republican of California, speaking to reporters late Tuesday evening in the Capitol. “I’m staying until we win,” he said.

results.title: Teen Stars of ‘Romeo and Juliet’ Sue Over Nudity in 1968 Film
results.abstract: Olivia Hussey and Leonard Whiting assert in a lawsuit that Paramount Pictures should have known nude images of them in their teens were “secretly and unlawfully obtained.”

media.caption: Olivia Hussey and Leonard Whiting in the 1968 film “Romeo and Juliet.”

results.title: Am I Getting Enough Vitamin D During the Winter?
results.abstract: If you live in certain parts of the country, you’ll need a lot more than sunlight to maintain adequate levels this season. Here’s what the experts recommend.

results.adx_keywords: Football;Sports Injuries;Hamlin, Damar (1998- );Buffalo Bills;Cincinnati Bengals;National Football League
results.byline: By Emmanuel Morgan and Ken Belson
results.title: Damar Hamlin of Buffalo Bills in Critical Condition After Collapsing During N.F.L. Game
results.abstract: Hamlin, a 24-year-old safety, went into cardiac arrest after being hit, but his heartbeat was restored by medical personnel, the Bills said. The game against the Cincinnati Bengals was postponed.

media.caption: An ambulance carrying Damar Hamlin left the field at Paycor Stadium during the game between the Bills and Bengals on Monday night.

results.adx_keywords: Television;Comedy and Humor;internal-sub-only
results.title: Stephen Colbert Is Thrilled Over Kevin McCarthy’s Troubles
results.abstract: “But remember, there’s more important things in life than winning or losing — there’s making fun of Kevin McCarthy for losing,” Colbert said.

media.caption: Stephen Colbert couldn’t keep from gloating over Representative Kevin McCarthy’s failure to become speaker of the House on Tuesday.

results.adx_keywords: Football;Sports Injuries;Concussions;Hamlin, Damar (1998- );Buffalo Bills;Cincinnati Bengals;National Football League
results.title: N.F.L. Says Suspended Game Won’t Resume This Week as Hamlin Stays in Hospital
results.abstract: An uncle of Damar Hamlin, a Bills safety who went into cardiac arrest during Monday’s game, said Tuesday night that doctors were working to get his nephew breathing on his own without a ventilator.

media.caption: Buffalo Bills players stayed on the field as an ambulance carried away safety Damar Hamlin. Hamlin was in critical condition on Tuesday morning.
media.copyright: Joseph Maiorana/USA Today Sports, via Reuters

results.adx_keywords: Abortion Drugs;Drugstores;Abortion;Regulation and Deregulation of Industry;Mail Order Companies;your-feed-healthcare;Food and Drug Administration;CVS Caremark Corporation;Walgreen Co
results.title: Abortion Pills Can Now Be Offered at Retail Pharmacies, F.D.A. Says
results.abstract: Mifepristone, the first of two drugs in medication abortions, previously had to be dispensed only by clinics, doctors or a few mail-order pharmacies. Now, if local drugstores or chains like CVS agree to certain rules, they can provide it.

results.title: The Key to Success in College Is So Simple, It’s Almost Never Mentioned
results.abstract: Students must be willing to learn.

results.adx_keywords: Travel and Vacations;Safaris;Cheetahs;Coronavirus (2019-nCoV);Endangered and Extinct Species;Maasai Mara National Reserve (Kenya)
results.byline: By Maria Cramer and Costas Christ
results.title: The Cheetahs Made a Kill. Then the Safari Trucks Swarmed In.
results.abstract: A video showing dozens of vehicles moving in on a pair of big cats in a Kenyan game reserve highlights how “aggressive tourism” can put endangered animals at even greater risk.

media.caption: About 60 vehicles waited near the Mara River in Kenya as wildebeests and zebras gathered in August to cross the waterway as part of their migration on the Serengeti Plain.
